General.Name: Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten Tbk PT
General.Description: PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk provides various banking services in Indonesia. The company offers demand, savings, and time deposits, as well as current accounts; and investment, working capital, and consumer loans. It also provides consumer, commercial, and MSME loans. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Pundi Indonesia, Tbk and changed its name to PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk in August 2016. PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Serang, Indonesia. PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Banten, Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Banten Global Development.
General.Address: Jl. Sudirman Lingkungan Kemang, Serang, Indonesia
